item.description: Seasalt.ai, a Conversational AI consulting startup, is built during the COVID-19 pandemic: we hired the first employee in March 2020 and most team members have never met each face to face. Besides running regular Scrum-based sprints, we organize cloud happy hours every Friday. The co-founders will buy everyone lunch and we hang out on Google Meet.
